attributes.title: Destiny 2 - Wardcliff Coil
attributes.caption: In the first episode of the series, Marcus and Adam face a tough build as they tackle Destiny 2’s Wardcliff Coil.
attributes.description: In the first episode of the series, Marcus and Adam face a tough build as they tackle Destiny 2’s Wardcliff Coil.

attributes.title: Blade Runner - Retinal Scanner
attributes.caption: Marcus and Adam fabricate a replicant identifying retinal scanner inspired by the production design and aesthetic of the Blade Runner universe.
attributes.description: Marcus and Adam fabricate a replicant identifying retinal scanner inspired by the production design and aesthetic of the Blade Runner universe.

attributes.title: Star Wars - Custom Lightsabers
attributes.caption: Marcus and Adam build their own custom lightsabers. Always two there are, no more, no less. A master, and an apprentice.
attributes.description: Marcus and Adam build their own custom lightsabers. Always two there are, no more, no less. A master, and an apprentice.

attributes.title: Alien - Motion Tracker
attributes.caption: Adam and Marcus build a Xenomorph detecting motion tracker from the game Alien: Isolation.
attributes.description: Adam and Marcus build a Xenomorph detecting motion tracker from the game Alien: Isolation.

attributes.title: Monster Hunter: World - Jaw Blade
attributes.caption: Adam and Marcus fabricate a massive 7 foot sword out of balsa wood, it’s Monster Hunting time!
attributes.description:
Adam and Marcus fabricate a massive 7 foot sword out of balsa wood, it’s Monster Hunting time!

attributes.title: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
attributes.caption: In order to accomplish their most challenging build to date, Marcus and Adam travel to Blizzard's campus in California to score some R & D from the artists and creators who made one of World Of Warcraft's most iconic weapons.
attributes.description: In order to accomplish their most challenging build to date, Marcus and Adam travel to Blizzard's campus in California to score some R & D from the artists and creators who made one of World Of Warcraft's most iconic weapons : Thunderfury Blessed Blade of the Windseeker. Thanks to Blizzard Entertainment Inc. for sponsoring this video. Check out the game here: http://www.worldofwarcraft.com.
attributes.display_title: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

attributes.title: Making the Devil Sword Dante! - Devil May Cry 5
attributes.caption: Thanks to Capcom for sponsoring this episode and for more info on Devil May Cry 5 click this link: http://www.devilmaycry5.com/. Marcus and Adam tackle their most challenging build to date, the Devil Sword Dante from Devil May Cry 5.
attributes.description:
Thanks to Capcom for sponsoring this episode and for more info on Devil May Cry 5 click this link: http://www.devilmaycry5.com/. 

Marcus and Adam tackle their most challenging build to date, the Devil Sword Dante from Devil May Cry 5.
attributes.display_title: Making the Devil Sword Dante! - Devil May Cry 5
